/* package codechef; // don't place package name! */

import java.util.*;
import java.lang.*;
import java.io.*;

/* Name of the class has to be "Main" only if the class is public. */
class Codechef
{
	public static void main (String[] args) throws IOException
	{
		// your code goes here
		BufferedReader stdin=new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
		
		int t;
		String str;
		int l;
		String left="",right="";
		t=Integer.parseInt(stdin.readLine());
		for(int i=1;i<=t;i++)
		{
		    str=stdin.readLine();
		    l=str.length();
		    left=str.substring(0,l/2);
		    right=str.substring(l/2);
		    left=rev(left);
		    right=rev(right);
		    System.out.println(left+right);
		}
	}
	public static String rev(String str)
	{
	    String result="";
	    int l=str.length();char ch;
	    for(int i=l-1;i>=0;i--)
	    {ch=str.charAt(i);result=result+ch;}
	    return result;
	}
}
